name: Anas Samran
classification_reason: Technical Support Manager at Eastnets with 15+ years in technical support and service delivery roles at major tech companies (Microsoft, Cisco, Amazon). Manages support operations where ticket handling and ITIL processes are central responsibilities. Experience includes maintaining 'respect of ITIL in the support journey of customers' at Microsoft, indicating direct involvement with ticket management processes. Current role as manager suggests decision-making authority for support tools and processes. Company size likely falls within target range given Eastnets' global presence in financial technology. Career progression from technical support to management roles demonstrates operational leadership experience where resolution efficiency and knowledge management would be critical pain points.

talking_points: Technical support management experience across multiple companies (Eastnets, Estarta Solutions, Microsoft, Cisco)
ITIL framework expertise and support journey optimization
Multilingual capabilities (Arabic, French, English, Spanish, Italian)
Product management and service enhancement background from Orange role
Experience with major tech companies including Microsoft, Cisco, and Amazon
Strong team leadership and management skills demonstrated across roles
pain_points: Managing complex technical support operations across multiple products/services
Ensuring ITIL compliance and process optimization in support workflows
Team management challenges in technical support environments
Product ecosystem alignment and integration issues
Multilingual support coordination for diverse customer bases
Balancing technical depth with management responsibilities
analysis.outreach_approach: Start with a personalized email referencing their technical support management background and experience with major tech companies. Focus on how your solution can help streamline their support operations and improve team efficiency. Mention specific aspects of their background that align with your offering, such as ITIL compliance or multilingual support capabilities.
personalization: Reference their current role as Technical Support Manager at Eastnets
Mention their ITIL experience from Microsoft role
Note their multilingual capabilities as a valuable asset
Connect to their product management background at Orange
Reference their technical support experience across Cisco, Microsoft, and Amazon
Acknowledge their team management progression from Team Manager at Amazon to current role
